body.name: A Winter Baby on Her Doorway: A Historical Western Romance Novel

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #627 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #2 in Victorian Historical Romance (Kindle Store) #2 in American Historical Romance (Kindle Store) #2 in American Historical Romance (Books)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book is an enticingly, well-told story with lots of twists and turns!Lizzy left her father’s ranch in Texas to move to Colorado to start Grove Ranch a horse training ranch on her own after her mother’s death. Lizzy is a strong, determined woman who will not let anyone stand in the way of her plans. Baby abandoned on her porch with cryptic unsigned letter. James is from Utah and left his uncle and sister at farm to join military. He is stationed in Maine where he receives letter from his uncle postmarked Grove county Colorado that his sister is missing. Intrigue about his sister, Sylvia’s whereabouts and his uncle’s shady second business. After years of military service James resigned to head for Colorado in order to find his sister and his horse goes lame 2 miles from Grove Ranch. Grove Ranch is where he found his niece that Lizzy named Elysse. “We’ve already seen miracles occur in the last few days, so maybe we can dare to expect another” is James statement to Lizzy. The search is underway to find Sylvia taking baby, Elysee with them. Informed at Cool Ridge others are also searching for Sylvia, a “giant”. Meanwhile Sylvia is knocked over by a cart driven by local doctor and taken to his home. Dr Watts wants her to stay at least a week to recover.Need to read story for all the details of what happened to killer staking Sylvia, what happened to Lizzy and James to be taken by native tribe and what happens to Dr Watts and Sylvia. Prepare to be entertained.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Romantic Mystery
reviews.reviewText: Carol Colyer always writes a great book! This one is quite the romantic mystery. She keeps you reading to find out what is next, there is so much going on. It is a hard book to put down once you start. Lizzy Cooper is a rancher who one day finds a baby on her doorstep. This one thing is used by Carol Colyer to spin the most amazing mystery. I don't want to reveal anything, but everything spins around the baby. It is a great read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A baby opens a closed heart
reviews.reviewText: The story is unique. That is why i settled on four stars. Most of the book moves along telling a story different from the hundreds of stories I have read that take place in the American west. There is a goal set but once the goal is reached it seems as if the author does not know how to end the book. Maybe as much as 4/5ths of the book is a good read. The ending needs a lot of work. It is worth reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fighting for the Future
reviews.reviewText: This story has quite a few details which will keep you turning pages with fear and trepidation for our heroines and hero’s. Our author has skillfully crafted the journey to keep one entertained. Worry about the outcome will keep one enthralled to the end. A very delightful read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Winter Baby on Her Doorstep
reviews.reviewText: A very good story about a woman rancher finding a baby on her doorstep and the man that has a lame horse shows up and recognized the blanket the baby was in.The baby belonged to his sister that he was trying to find so they traveled to find her and survived danger and fell in love and find happiness Wonderful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Carol knows how to keep you reading. This story of a young woman fleeing a killer grabs your interest and show how family came Tito defeat this evil. There is fear, sadness over losses, and hope along with love woven throughout. Read to see what happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The story was not completely predictable. Kept my attention. Nice little book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars James and Lizzy

reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend this book by a great author
